name: Alan Ryder
personality: Nervous, jumpy, always looking over his shoulder.
description: Alan dug up something he shouldn't have near Sloan. Now he’s hiding out in Goodsprings until the heat dies down.
questHooks: Claims a gang is after him for something he found.
Shows the player a strange cap he dug up — faintly warm.
Says the ground near Sloan 'hums' at night.
